description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物。
description.en: A political figure of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国山东省日照市下辖的一个县。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Rizhao City, Shandong Province, China.

en: Weifang Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在潍坊市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Communist Party of China in Weifang City.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省已撤销的地区级行政单位。
description.en: A defunct prefecture-level administrative unit in Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国青岛市地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Qingdao City, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国山东省的国家法律监督机关。
description.en: The state's legal supervisory organ in Shandong Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，臧坤之女。
description.en: Chinese political figure, daughter of Zang Kun.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任青岛市市长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former mayor of Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任青岛市市长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former mayor of Qingdao.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山东省人民检察院检察长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former Procurator-General of Shandong Provincial People's Procuratorate.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任山东省人民检察院检察长。
description.en: Chinese political figure, former Procurator-General of Shandong Provincial People's Procuratorate.

description.zh-cn: 臧坤是山东五莲人。
description.en: Zang Kun was a native of Wulian, Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 臧坤早年曾担任中共潍坊市委书记。
description.en: In his early years, Zang Kun served as the Secretary of the Weifang Municipal Committee of the CPC.

description.zh-cn: 臧坤早年曾担任昌潍地区行署副专员。
description.en: In his early years, Zang Kun served as the Deputy Commissioner of the Changwei Prefecture Administrative Office.

description.zh-cn: 臧坤于1981年12月至1983年4月期间担任青岛市人民政府副市长。
description.en: Zang Kun served as the Deputy Mayor of the Qingdao Municipal People's Government from December 1981 to April 1983.

description.zh-cn: 臧坤于1983年4月至1986年6月期间担任青岛市人民政府市长。
description.en: Zang Kun served as the Mayor of the Qingdao Municipal People's Government from April 1983 to June 1986.

description.zh-cn: 臧坤于1986年6月至1993年7月期间担任山东省人民检察院检察长。
description.en: Zang Kun served as the Procurator-General of the Shandong Provincial People's Procuratorate from June 1986 to July 1993.

description.zh-cn: 臧爱民是臧坤的女儿。
description.en: Zang Aimin is the daughter of Zang Kun.

description.zh-cn: 臧坤是中国共产党党员。
description.en: Zang Kun was a member of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 臧坤接替李秉政出任青岛市人民政府市长。
description.en: Zang Kun succeeded Li Bingzheng as the Mayor of Qingdao Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 郭松年接替臧坤出任青岛市人民政府市长。
description.en: Guo Songnian succeeded Zang Kun as the Mayor of Qingdao Municipal People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 臧坤接替李惠民出任山东省人民检察院检察长。
description.en: Zang Kun succeeded Li Huimin as the Procurator-General of Shandong Provincial People's Procuratorate.

description.zh-cn: 赵长风接替臧坤出任山东省人民检察院检察长。
description.en: Zhao Changfeng succeeded Zang Kun as the Procurator-General of Shandong Provincial People's Procuratorate.
